column5: Lets see if the picture is there from BOQ  Yaaaa.." Baby..it's in there....?  It took a little resizeing... but i got it...?  More pictures to come.... from bay of quinte....
Nice Pickeral! How heavy was that girl?  Cheers, 1leg

It was a fat 11lbs.... i hope there is room for the pictures... we caught 8lbdears was the smallest 9lbs.. 10lbs,.. 11lbs..12lbs.. i got pictures to prove 'em.. i will be posting them and puting them in my profile or album...
Awesome!  I've never caught one over 7.  Good job!
We where trolling useing planer boards.... and flat line out the back of the boat.......We just knocked'em silly... "
I've only ever fished the BOQ for bass, but I'd love to get down and try for some eyes.
Nothing beats those big eye's,.."  you can't catch them anywhere else. but BOQ...

hey northwood you can still catch em that big in the ottawa river,st.lawrance,lake st.francis,and lake of the woods,they all regularly produce 10lb plus all the time,,yes its a little harder to get a 13 or 14 but they are there as well,...but overall BOQ gets my vote for sure    cheers
